name: Persuasive
text: You are skilled at swaying attitudes and intimidating others into your way of thinking.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
mythicText: You’re a master of persuasion, be it with soothing words or harsh barking commands.
mythicBenefit: The bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate skill checks granted by Persuasive increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat a Diplomacy or Intimidate check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
text_zh: 你善于动摇态度和胁迫他人按你的想法行事。
benefit_zh: 你在交涉和威吓技能检定上获得+2加值。如果某技能受训等级10以上，该技能获得的加值提升为+4。
mythicText_zh: 舌灿莲花的你精通话术。
mythicBenefit_zh: 谈判专家专长对交涉与威吓技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次交涉或者威吓检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。
